column4: Hi Ubuntu, what is the command line for removing a program, i just can't remember :(
if you compiled, you can remove by deleting.. if you used apt or synaptic/software center, you use that to remove
where is it located? /etc/ i assume?
depends where you installed it and what steps you did
then you should use apt to remove
It didn't work though. What annoys me is its in the applications menu.
can you still access the program?
Yes it says a file isn't useable. Regardless i need to upgrade it anyways.
if it's not useable it could be a broken link.. try dpkg -l whatpulse
then it's a broken link and your package is gone
go into system menu and look for menu something or others
can you run it from terminal still?
i still get errors but yes.
